sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Downloads the Edge encryption artifacts from the secure server on install of the Edge Encryption plugin</description> <name>DownloadEdgeArtifacts</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(new sn_edge_encryption_ns.EdgeEncryptionArtifactAPI()).scheduleProcess();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>hari.chetlur</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-01-24 18:50:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5a38ea26cb370300216078d5634c9c65</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DownloadEdgeArtifacts</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">bc1ce2b193033100fa71b33e867ffb6d</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">bc1ce2b193033100fa71b33e867ffb6d</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5a38ea26cb370300216078d5634c9c65</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>hari.chetlur</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-01-24 18:50:11</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
